silver.name: Team Building
silver.desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 7 player combats.

silver.name: Band of Thieves I
silver.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

silver.name: Caretaker's Ally
silver.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

silver.name: Best Friends I
silver.desc: Units isolated in pairs gain 12% Attack Speed and 12 Armor at the start of combat.

silver.name: Branching Out
silver.desc: Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

silver.name: Silver Ticket
silver.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll after every 4 rerolls. Gain 3 gold.

silver.name: Buried Treasures I
silver.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 2 rounds (including this round).

silver.name: Partial Ascension
silver.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.

silver.name: Rolling For Days I
silver.desc: Gain 9 free Shop rerolls that never expire.

silver.name: Component Buffet
silver.desc: Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

silver.name: Cybernetic Bulk I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 health.

silver.name: Exiles I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

silver.name: Featherweights I
silver.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 15% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

silver.name: Unified Resistance I
silver.desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.

silver.name: Good For Something I
silver.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 35% to drop 1 gold on death.

silver.name: Harmacist I
silver.desc:
Your team has 10% Omnivamp and convert 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

silver.name: Healing Orbs I
silver.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 225.

silver.name: Help Is On The Way
silver.desc: After 8 player combats. choose 1 of 4 Support items.

silver.name: Iron Assets
silver.desc: Gain a Component Anvil and 4 Gold.

silver.name: Item Grab Bag I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

silver.name: Keepers I
silver.desc: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 175 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

silver.name: Lategame Specialist
silver.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

silver.name: Latent Forge
silver.desc: After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

silver.name: Missed Connections
silver.desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

silver.name: One, Two, Five!
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

silver.name: Ones Twos Three
silver.desc: Gain 3 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

silver.name: Pandora's Items
silver.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random component.

silver.name: Pumping Up I
silver.desc: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.

silver.name: Recombobulator
silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

silver.name: Blistering Strikes
silver.desc: Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

silver.name: Risky Moves
silver.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 Player combats, gain 33 Gold.

silver.name: Silver Spoon
silver.desc: Gain 10 XP.

silver.name: Silver Veil
silver.desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.

silver.name: Stationary Support I
silver.desc: After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) equipped with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

silver.name: Sticks And Stones
silver.desc: Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.

silver.name: Stimpack
silver.desc: Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

silver.name: Switching Gears
silver.desc: Gain 3 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.

silver.name: Teaming Up I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random 3-cost champions.

silver.name: Tiny Titans
silver.desc: Increase your current and maximum player health by 30.

silver.name: Tri Force I
silver.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 150 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

silver.name: Young and Wild and Free
silver.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 2 Gold.

silver.name: Lunch Money
silver.desc: Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.

silver.name: Fine Vintage
silver.desc: Completed items left on your bench for 4 rounds transform into Support items.

silver.name: Over Encumbered
silver.desc: For the next stage, you only get 1 bench slots. After, get 3 item components.

silver.name: Pick of the Litter
silver.desc: Open a special shop with three free 3-cost champions. You can only pick one, but you get 2 copies of it.

silver.name: Pick of the Litter+
silver.desc: Open a special shop with three free 4-cost champions. You can only pick one, but you get 2 copies of it.

silver.name: Sharing Is Caring
silver.desc: Combat start: You gain 1 gold and your opponent gains 1 gold.

silver.name: The Golden Remover
silver.desc:
Gain a Golden Remover and component item anvil.

Golden Remover is an Item Remover with infinite uses.

silver.name: Latent Forge
silver.desc: After 4 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

gold.name: A Cut Above
gold.desc: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.

gold.name: Balanced Budget
gold.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 7 Gold.

gold.name: Balanced Budget+
gold.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 9 gold.

gold.name: Caretaker's Favor
gold.desc: Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

gold.name: Best Friends II
gold.desc: Units isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 20 Armor at the start of combat.

gold.name: Big Gains
gold.desc: Your team gains 100 bonus Health, and permanently gains 10 Health every 2 takedowns.

gold.name: Big Grab Bag
gold.desc: Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

gold.name: Buried Treasures II
gold.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 3 rounds (including this round).

gold.name: Capricious Forge
gold.desc: Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two random Artifacts each round.

gold.name: Clear Mind
gold.desc: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat round, gain 3 XP.

gold.name: Cluttered Mind
gold.desc: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

gold.name: Combat Caster
gold.desc: Your team gains a 90-170 Shield for 4 seconds after casting their Ability. The Shield amount scales with round of the game.

gold.name: Ascension
gold.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

gold.name: Crash Test Dummies
gold.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies. Combat start: Your Target Dummies launch themselves towards the largest clump of enemies and Stun them for 1.25 seconds.

gold.name: Crown Guarded
gold.desc: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 100% stronger.

gold.name: Cybernetic Bulk II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.

gold.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.

gold.name: Stand United II
gold.desc: Your units gain 2.5% Attack Damage and 2.5 Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.

gold.name: Escort Quest
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. You gain 3 gold every time it survives player combat.

gold.name: Unified Resistance II
gold.desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

gold.name: Fully Adapted
gold.desc: Gain an Adaptive Helm. Champions holding this item gain both effects, regardless of position.

gold.name: Gargantuan Resolve
gold.desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 40 instead of 25.

gold.name: Gifts from the fallen
gold.desc:
Your team gains 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

Each time an ally dies, gain these stats again.

gold.name: Harmacist II
gold.desc:
Your team has 15% Omnivamp and convert 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

gold.name: Healing Orbs II
gold.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 450.

gold.name: Heavy Hitters
gold.desc: Your units with at least 1500 max Health gain Attack Damage and Ability Power equal to 1% of their max Health.

gold.name: Heroic grab bag
gold.desc: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 6 gold.

gold.name: Idealism
gold.desc: Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions holding this item deal 12% increased damage.

gold.name: Inspiring Epitaph
gold.desc: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 20% max Health shield and 10% stacking Attack Speed.

gold.name: Jeweled Lotus II
gold.desc: Your team gains 15% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

gold.name: Keepers II
gold.desc: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 260 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

gold.name: Know Your Enemy
gold.desc: Your team deals 10% more damage. Deal 15% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

gold.name: Patient Study
gold.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

gold.name: Learning To Spell
gold.desc: Your team gains 18 bonus Ability Power, and permanently gains 1 Ability Power every 2 takedowns.

gold.name: Little Buddies
gold.desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 65 Health and 9% Attack Speed for each 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: Long Distance Pals
gold.desc: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest form each other form a bond, sharing 20% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

gold.name: Low Interest Rates
gold.desc: Your max interest is capped at 4 gold but you gain 2 gold at the start of every player combat.

gold.name: Lucky Streak
gold.desc: Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

gold.name: Martyr
gold.desc: Whenever one of your allies die, your team heals for 9% of their amx Health.

gold.name: Metabolic Accelerator
gold.desc: Gain 2 player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

gold.name: Not Today
gold.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Magic Wand
gold.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.

gold.name: Pandora's Items II
gold.desc:
Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Gain 2 random component items.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

gold.name: Pumping Up II
gold.desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.

gold.name: Salvage Bin
gold.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

gold.name: Salvage Bin+
gold.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

gold.name: Scapegoat
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

gold.name: Shock Treatment
gold.desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv. Your Stikk Shivs' chain lightning effect deals 40~125% more damage (based on stage level).

gold.name: Sleight of Hand
gold.desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 200 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Stars are Born
gold.desc: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

gold.name: Stationary Support II
gold.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

gold.name: Support Cache
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Support items.

gold.name: Teaming Up II
gold.desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

gold.name: Three's a Crowd
gold.desc: Your team gains 66 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: Three's Company
gold.desc: Gain 4 random 3-cost champions.

gold.name: Tons of Stats!
gold.desc: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

gold.name: Trade Sector
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

gold.name: Built Different II
gold.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 240-530 Health and 45-60% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

gold.name: Two Healthy
gold.desc: Your team gains 90 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: Wandering Trainer I
gold.desc: Gain 1 gold and a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems.

gold.name: What Doesn't Kill You
gold.desc: Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.

gold.name: You Have My Bow
gold.desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

gold.name: You Have My Sword
gold.desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

gold.name: Altruist Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Altruist Emblem and a Riven.

gold.name: Arcanist Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Arcanist Emblem and a Lux.

gold.name: Behemoth Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Behemoth Emblem, a Shen, and a Thresh.

gold.name: Boiling Point
gold.desc: Porcelains' attacks grant 3 bonus Mana. While boiling, their attacks also Burn and Wound. Gain a Lux and an Amumu.

gold.name: Bruiser Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and an Aatrox.

gold.name: Call to Adventure
gold.desc: Every 2 takedowns, Storyweaver Kayle permanently gains 3 Ability Power and 18 Health. Gain a Garen and a Sivir.

gold.name: Divine Rolls
gold.desc: At the start of every stage, including this one, gain 4 free rerolls + 1 for each of your Heavenly champions. Gain a Kha'Zix and a Malphite.

gold.name: Dragon's Spirit
gold.desc: Gain a Dragon's Claw. Every time you heal 7000 Health with Dragon's Claws, gain an item component, up to 4.

gold.name: Dragonlord Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Dragonlord Emblem, a Janna, and a Diana.

gold.name: Drop Blossom!
gold.desc: Gain a Neeko. Your strongest Neeko's spell Heals 35% more, and slams for 35% increased damage. Each cast increases the spell radius by 1.

gold.name: Dryad Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Dryad Emblem and a Gnar.

gold.name: Duelist Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Duelist Emblem and a Qiyana.

gold.name: Dynamic Duo
gold.desc: Get a random 5-cost champion and a random champion that shares a trait with them. Get 20 gold.

gold.name: Extended Duel
gold.desc: Your Duelists start combat with 2 stacks. At max stacks, they gain 10% Omnivamp. Gain a Darius and a Yasuo.

gold.name: Enter the Dragon
gold.desc: After the dragon strikes, Dragonlords deal 20% bonus true damage. Gain a Janna.

gold.name: Epoch
gold.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 6 XP and 2 free rerolls for that round only.

gold.name: Epoch+
gold.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls for that round only.

gold.name: Ethereal Blades
gold.desc: Gain a Shen. Your Strongest Shen gains +3 Range and his spell does 85% increased damage.

gold.name: Fated Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Fated Emblem and a Kindred.

gold.name: Fortune Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Fortune Emblem and a Teemo.

gold.name: Ghostly Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Ghostly Emblem and an Shen.

gold.name: Grim Harvest
gold.desc: Your Reapers gain 8% Critical Strike chance and 5% Omnivamp. They gain this bonus again every time they get a takedown. Gain a Kindred and Yone.

gold.name: Haunted House
gold.desc: Enemies that die while haunted by Ghostly pass 2 extra spectre to a nearby enemy. Gain a Caitlyn and a Shen.

gold.name: Heavenly Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Heavenly Emblem and a Neeko.

gold.name: Inkshadow Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Inkshadow Emblem and a Senna.

gold.name: Invoker Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Invoker Emblem and a Janna.

gold.name: It's Going to be Epic
gold.desc: Every time a unique Mythic champion becomes Epic, gain 2 player health and 3 gold. Gain a Cho'Gath and Kog'Maw.

gold.name: Long Shot
gold.desc: Snipers gain 15% Attack Speed. Gain a Caitlyn and a Kog'Maw. After Snipers have attacked a total distance of 1200 hexes, gain a Sniper's Focus.

gold.name: Lucky Paws
gold.desc: Gain a 2-star Kobuko. Your strongest Kobuko's Ability deals 225% damage. If Kobuko kills an enemy, they have a 100% chance to drop 1 gold.

gold.name: Lucky Ricochet
gold.desc: Trickshots bounce 1 additional time for 40% of original damage. Gain a Sivir and Teemo.

gold.name: Mana Shield
gold.desc: Whenever an Invoker casts, grant the lowest Health ally Shield equal to 200% of Mana spent. Gain a Janna.

gold.name: Midnight Siphon
gold.desc: Gain a Yorick. Your Strongest Yorick gains 25% max Health and additionally deals 20% of his max Health with his ability.

gold.name: Mulched
gold.desc: Every round, gain 2 Dryad stacks. If a Dryad deals 8% additional damage. Gain a Rek'Sai and a Gnar.

gold.name: Mythic Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Mythic Emblem and a Neeko.

gold.name: Porcelain Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Porcelain Emblem and a Lux.

gold.name: Prizefighter
gold.desc: Gain 1 item component(s). Every 3 wins gives you an item component.

gold.name: Raid Boss
gold.desc: Combat start: Your strongest Behemoth gains 20% Health. When other Behomoths die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Cho'Gath and a Malphite.

gold.name: Raining Gold
gold.desc: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

gold.name: Raining Gold+
gold.desc: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

gold.name: Reaper Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Reaper Emblem and a Kindred

gold.name: ReinFOURcement
gold.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Get 12 gold.

gold.name: Sage Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Sage Emblem, a Zyra, and a Diana.

gold.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
gold.desc: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top 4, they have 10% more Health.

gold.name: Slammin'
gold.desc: Gain 1 Component Anvil. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

gold.name: Slammin'+
gold.desc: Gain 1 Component Anvil and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

gold.name: Sniper Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem and a Senna.

gold.name: Spirit Guardians
gold.desc: Wardens' start of combat damage reduction is increased by 12%. 20% of damage dealt to non-Wardens is instead distributed across your Wardens. Get a Garen and a Jax.

gold.name: Storied Champion
gold.desc: Gain a 2-star Garen. Your strongest Garen's Ability now grants stacking max Health instead of Shield. If he has more max Health than his target, his Ability deals 45% bonus true damage.

gold.name: Storyweaver Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Storyweaver Emblem and a Garen.

gold.name: The Road Less Traveled
gold.desc: Gain 1 XP. Each unique Sage that starts combat in the middle 2 rows grants 1 XP. Gain a Zyra.

gold.name: Too Much Candy
gold.desc: Your rerolls cost 0 gold. Every 6 rerolls, the cost goes up by 1 gold. At the start of each stage your reroll cost is reset to 0.

gold.name: Umbral Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Umbral Emblem and a Yorick.

gold.name: Venerable Piggy Bank
gold.desc:
Gain 2 Exalted Champions. Your Exalted Soul Core gains gold instead of XP. If you lose combat, it gets 3 bonus gold.

If there no 1 or 2-cost Exalted champions, get one 3-cost instead.

gold.name: Warden Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Warden Emblem, a Jax, and an Amumu.

gold.name: Well Fed
gold.desc: Bruisers heal 2% of their max Health every 1 second. Gain a Kobuko and a Rek'Sai.

gold.name: Wrath of the Moon
gold.desc: Umbral champions deal 3.5% more damage every second they continue attacking an enemy. Resets when they swap targets. Gain a Darius and a Yorick.

gold.name: Drop Blossom!+
gold.desc: Gain a 2-star Neeko. Your strongest Neeko's spell Heals 35% more, and slams for 35% increased damage. Each cast increases the spell radius by 1.

gold.name: Ethereal Blades+
gold.desc: Gain a 2-star Shen. Your Strongest Shen gains +3 Range and his spell does 100% increased damage.

gold.name: Midnight Siphon+
gold.desc: Gain a 2-star Yorick. Your Strongest Yorick gains 25% max Health and additionally deals 20% of his max Health with his ability.

prismatic.name: Caretaker's Chosen
prismatic.desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: Component Anvil
Level 6: Completed Item Anvil
Level 8: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items.

prismatic.name: Birthday Present
prismatic.desc: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's cost is your level minus 4 (min: 1-cost).

prismatic.name: Blinding Speed
prismatic.desc: Gain a Red Buff, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve bow and a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Buried Treasures III
prismatic.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).

prismatic.name: Final Ascension
prismatic.desc: Your team deals 15% more damage. After 15 seconds, they deal 45% more damage.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Bulk III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 500 health.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.

prismatic.name: Prismatic Ticket
prismatic.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 50% chance to gain a free reroll.

prismatic.name: Going Long
prismatic.desc: You no longer gain interest. Gain 10 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

prismatic.name: Jeweled Lotus III
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 40% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

prismatic.name: Harmacist III
prismatic.desc: Your team has 25% Omnivamp and converts 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund
prismatic.desc: Gain 20 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund+
prismatic.desc: Gain 30 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund++
prismatic.desc: Gain 40 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

prismatic.name: Shopping Spree
prismatic.desc: Gain 4 gold. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds.

prismatic.name: Impenetrable Bulwark
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Living Forge
prismatic.desc: Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 8 player combats.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves+
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Level Up!
prismatic.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 8 immediately.

prismatic.name: New Recruit
prismatic.desc: Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.

prismatic.name: Overwhelming Force
prismatic.desc: Gain a Deathblade, an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Pandora's Items III
prismatic.desc:
Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday
prismatic.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday+
prismatic.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

prismatic.name: Pumping Up III
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.

prismatic.name: Radiant Relics
prismatic.desc: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Roll The Dice
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

prismatic.name: March of Progress
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

prismatic.name: Starter Kit
prismatic.desc:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 4 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

prismatic.name: Stationary Support III
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).

prismatic.name: The Golden Egg
prismatic.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan+
prismatic.desc:
Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.

prismatic.name: Unleashed Arcana
prismatic.desc: Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Accomplice
prismatic.desc: Get a Support Thief's Gloves and 2 gold.

prismatic.name: Altruist Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Altruist Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Riven.

prismatic.name: Arcanist Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Arcanist Emblem, a Statikk Shiv, and a Lux.

prismatic.name: At What Cost
prismatic.desc: Immediately go to level 6. You don't get to choose your future augments. Gain 1 gold.

prismatic.name: Ba-BOOM!
prismatic.desc: Your champions deal 90% more damage for 2 seconds on every other cast.

prismatic.name: Behemoth Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Behemoth Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, a Yorick, and a Thresh.

prismatic.name: Bruiser Crown

[58 gold], [64 experience], [40 rerolls that do not expire], [Training dummy with 2x Zeke's Herald], [Training dummy with 2x Locket of the Iron Solari], [3x Hullcrushers and an item remover], [3x Snipers focus and an item remover], [Random 3-star 3-cost unit and 20 gold], [3x Thief's Gloves and an item remover], [5 random emblems(no duplicates) and an item remover]
